sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_appauthor.ScopedAppDataUnloader</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ScopedAppDataUnloader</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ScopedAppDataUnloader = Class.create();
ScopedAppDataUnloader.prototype = {
    initialize: function(/*String*/ zipName) {
		if (gs.nil(zipName))
			throw "Missing required parameter [zipFileName: String]";
		
		this._zipName = zipName;
		this._zip = new GlideZipOutputStream(this._zipName);
		this._zipID = this._zip.getAttachmentSysID();
		this._unloader = new GlideAppLoader();
		this.inventory = [];
    },

	generateXMLFromGR: /*String*/ function(/*GlideRecord*/ gr) {
		return this._unloader.unloadRecordToXML(gr, true);
	},
	
	generateXMLFromDelete: /*String*/ function(/*GlideRecord*/ gr) {
		return this._unloader.unloadDeleteToXML(gr);
	},
	
	unload: /*boolean*/ function(/*String*/ directory, /*String*/ fileName, /*String*/ xml) {
		var unload = gs.nil(directory) ? fileName : directory + "/" + fileName;
		if (gs.nil(xml)) {
			gs.error('  Failed to unload: ' + unload + ' - XML was nil');
			return false;
		}
		
		if (!this._zip.putNextEntry(unload))
			return false;
		
		gs.debug('  Creating checksum and downloading inventory: ' + unload);
		var checksum = sn_pack_opt.PackageOptimizerAPI.getInventoryHash(xml);
		this.inventory.push([unload + ";" + checksum]);
		
		gs.debug('  Unloading: ' + unload);
		try {
			this._zip.write(xml);
		} finally {
			this._zip.closeEntry();
		}
		
		return true;
	},
	
	populateInventoryHeader: function(inventoryHeader) {
		this.inventory = this.inventory.concat(inventoryHeader);
	},
	
	close: /*void*/ function() {
		this.unloadInventory(this.inventory);
		this._zip.close();
	},
	
	unloadInventory: function() {
		this.unload("", "package_inventory.csv", this.inventory.join('\n'));
	},
	
	getAttachmentSysID: /*String*/ function() {
		return this._zipID;
	},
	
	getAttachmentFileName: /*String*/ function() {
		return this._zipName;
	},

	getOutputStream: /*GlideZipOutputStream*/ function() {
		return this._zip;
	},
	
    type: 'ScopedAppDataUnloader'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-09-21 05:48:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>29687711d71321004f6a0eca5e610385</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>50</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ScopedAppDataUnloader</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Scoped App Author" source="sn_appauthor">893ea311d71321004f6a0eca5e6103e6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Scoped App Author">893ea311d71321004f6a0eca5e6103e6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29687711d71321004f6a0eca5e610385</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-10 18:14:12</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
